title: The new Redmi K50G is a gaming phone featuring the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip and 120W fast charging support
content:
Xiaomi’s sub-brand Redmi has launched a new Redmi K50 series device in China today. The new device, called the Redmi K50G, is a flagship-level gaming phone that packs Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, LPDDR5 RAM, UFS 3.1 storage, a 120Hz refresh rate display, and 120W fast charging support. On top of that, the device

The post The new Redmi K50G is a gaming phone featuring the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip and 120W fast charging support appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Redmi K50G is a flagship-level gaming smartphone that packs a 120Hz high refresh rate display, customizable gaming triggers, and the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip.
